featured.text: The Bluest Eye was eventually published in 1970.

other.text: In 1952, his first book, The Decisive Moment, a rich collection of his work spanning two decades, was published.

definition.en_def: To make content available to the public, typically in print or online.
definition.example: The author decided to publish her first novel this year.
